channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 米其林将宣布 62 家新晋星级法国餐厅
item.description:
Michelin to announce 62 newly starred French restaurantshttps://t.co/8OQc5DNRRm pic.twitter.com/z4cn07kIaL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 平壤国家媒体称金正日的女儿是 "伟大的指导者"（朝鲜语为 "hyangdo"）--这一称谓通常只用于最高领导人及其继任者。
item.description:
Daughter of North Korea's Kim might be heir apparent, says South Korea.

Pyongyang state media has referred to Kim's teenage daughter as a "great person of guidance" ("hyangdo" in Korean) - a term typically reserved for top leaders and their successorshttps://t.co/oY4z1t9tct pic.twitter.com/IehRvvUMpX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 基因疗法如何改变了镰状细胞患者的生活。两名美国人的生活因这种疗法而发生了转变，他们告诉 @AFP，他们希望其他人也能从中受益。但每个疗程高达 310 万美元的费用可能会限制患者获得治疗的机会。
item.description:
How genetic therapies transformed the lives of sickle cell patients.

Two Americans whose lives were turned around by the treatments tell @AFP they want others to benefit too. But the cost - up to $3.1 million per course of treatment - could limit accesshttps://t.co/OAKBJrVJUV pic.twitter.com/AclDRj7CkK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 棺材俱乐部 "埋葬了人们对死亡的禁忌。这是一项非常重要的任务，但没有什么能阻止新西兰人欢笑，他们聚在一起喝喝茶，说说笑笑，并在独一无二的 DIY 棺材上钉上最后一颗钉子。
item.description:
Coffin clubs' bury taboos about death.

It's a task of grave importance, but there's nothing to stop New Zealanders having a laugh as they meet for cups of tea, a bit of banter, and literally put the final nail in one-of-a-kind DIY coffinshttps://t.co/RjPrO4s7j7 pic.twitter.com/Nx0x3KYzoJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 内战》这部电影想象了近未来美国的第二次内战，凸显了人们对 11 月总统大选前美国分裂状态的担忧。
item.description:
'Civil War'

A film that imagines a second civil war in the near-future United States has highlighted fears about the divided state of the nation ahead of November's presidential electionhttps://t.co/vqHfnCIiGH pic.twitter.com/WLMyjuiKMQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 法新社特别报道：父亲的罪孽：阿里今年 12 岁，他经历了任何孩子都不应该经历的事情，他的半生都在相当于圣战者家庭监狱的营地中度过。
item.description:
AFP Special Report.

Sins of the fathers: Children of Islamic State left to rot in Syria camp.

Ali is 12 and has survived things no child should see, spending half his life in what amounts to a prison camp for jihadist familieshttps://t.co/XMuGIR7Zsl pic.twitter.com/GPyy2oZohi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 视频：巴黎奥运会前，缉毒犬备受追捧。在新的爆炸物探测犬考试中，多次出现不及格的情况，导致人们担心巴黎奥运会上会出现缉毒犬短缺的情况。不过，训练中心承诺今年夏天将有足够的缉毒犬....。
item.description:
VIDEO: Sniffer dogs are sought-after ahead of the Paris Olympics.

Numerous failures in the new exam for explosive detection dogs have led to fears of a shortage for the Paris Olympics. However, the training centre promises that there will be enough sniffer dogs this summer.… pic.twitter.com/zaqG1c4fum

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 视频： 印度港铁食品公司创造了世界上最长的多沙（一种印度流行菜肴）的新纪录。由 75 名厨师组成的团队将面糊倒在特制的平底锅上，然后同步卷起，制作出长达 37.5 米的可丽饼。
item.description:
VIDEO: New world record for longest dosa.

Indian company MTR Foods set a new record for the world's longest dosa, a popular Indian dish. A team of 75 chefs made the 37.5-metre crepe by pouring batter across a specially made pan and rolling it up in synchronised motions pic.twitter.com/gW2LMSRTHc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 怪兽、小行星、吸血鬼：非营利媒体事务》（Nonprofit Media Matters）报道了 TikTok 的趋势，在这一趋势中，用户试图将病毒视频货币化，声称美国政府秘密捕获了包括金刚在内的神话怪物。
item.description:
Monsters, asteroids, vampires: AI conspiracies flood TikTok.

Nonprofit Media Matters reports on TikTok trend where users seek to monetize viral videos making claims about the US government secretly capturing mythical monsters, including King Konghttps://t.co/1lhEIplOl3 pic.twitter.com/7FCeM5Yzmb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚出租车司机赢得优步 1.78 亿美元赔款
item.description:
Australian taxi drivers win $178 million payout from Uberhttps://t.co/X9qbF5lM6k pic.twitter.com/JOod132saN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 周日在莫斯科参加抗议投票的俄罗斯人对政治变革不抱什么希望，但他们知道反对弗拉基米尔-普京强硬统治的不止他们一个人，这让他们感到欣慰
item.description:
The Russians who came to cast a protest ballot in Moscow on Sunday had little hope for political change, but took comfort from knowing they were not alone in opposing Vladimir Putin's hardline rule https://t.co/l5TzFTGalF pic.twitter.com/PewhaA1cY9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 冰岛火山的熔岩在稳步推进，但速度有所放缓。格林达维克的居民在 11 月 11 日撤离后，直到 2 月 19 日才获准返回家园，但他们不得不再次出发
item.description:
Lava from Iceland volcano steadily advancing but slowing.

The residents of Grindavik, only cleared to return to their homes on February 19 after being evacuated on November 11, have had to depart again https://t.co/gTFPNpgcxV pic.twitter.com/gifIgy5EgS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在美国国务卿安东尼-布林肯访问韩国出席民主峰会之际，首尔军方称朝鲜于周一发射了一枚弹道导弹
item.description:
North Korea fired a ballistic missile on Monday, Seoul's military says, as US Secretary of State Antony Blinken visits South Korea to attend a democracy summithttps://t.co/QnOHQEhqlf pic.twitter.com/6Yzr2WRXYa

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 反对普京的正午"，阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗孀和亲密盟友周日在俄罗斯驻外使馆外加入了长长的投票队伍，许多人抗议他们所称的为延长弗拉基米尔-普京总统的统治而精心策划的选举。
item.description:
'Noon against Putin'

Alexei Navalny's widow and close allies joined long lines of voters outside Russian embassies in foreign capitals on Sunday, as many protested what they called a stage-managed election set to extend President Vladimir Putin's rulehttps://t.co/Y8Z8jMI2cP pic.twitter.com/AZMoFOxzYM

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 人们普遍预计，美国联邦储备委员会周三将再次维持其关键贷款利率不变，因为决策者们将继续讨论何时开始降息，并在与通胀的长期斗争中启动下一阶段。
item.description:
The US Federal Reserve is widely expected to keep its key lending rate unchanged again on Wednesday, as policymakers continue discussions over when to start rate cuts and launch the next phase in their long-running battle against inflation.https://t.co/QUpPdvO0Xc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京即将第五次执政，在过去二十年里，他建立了一套国内镇压和与西方对抗的体系。
item.description:
Russian President Vladimir Putin, who is head for a fifth term in power, has over the past two decades built up a system of domestic repression and confrontation with the West.https://t.co/ZXBvcrznRy pic.twitter.com/rZpeMwcEuE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 17, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他赞成在一定周数后在全国范围内禁止堕胎，但也有例外情况 -- 但他没有确认具体周数，这使得他在美国大选这一首要问题上的立场变得模糊不清。
item.description:
Donald Trump said he favors a national abortion ban after a certain number of weeks, with exceptions -- but did not confirm how many weeks, leaving his stance on a top US election issue murky.https://t.co/NpNYXgXrO2 pic.twitter.com/lAIUc6m5rd

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 17, 2024

item.title: 北约秘书长延斯-斯托尔滕贝格强调了应对全球变暖的必要性，并称气候变化是一个危机倍增器，会对全球安全产生影响。
item.description:
NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg stressed the need to fight global warming, and called climate change a crisis multiplier with implications for global security.https://t.co/JzBo4NHFa1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 17, 2024

item.title: 目击者称，包括一名法新社记者在内的约 50 人在伊斯坦布尔库尔德新年庆祝活动期间被警方拘留。
item.description:
Around 50 people including an AFP journalist were detained by police in Istanbul on the sidelines of the Kurdish New Year celebrations, witnesses said.https://t.co/2qIEuVYBim pic.twitter.com/dgAohlmPuS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 17, 2024

item.title: 普京称对手纳瓦尔尼之死是 "令人悲痛的事件 "#BREAKING Putin says opponent Navalny's death 'sad event'.
item.description:
#BREAKING Putin says opponent Navalny's death 'sad event' pic.twitter.com/PL9bstWe9s

item.title: 印度尼西亚选手乔纳坦-克里斯蒂（Jonatan Christie）以 21：15、21：14 击败同胞安东尼-西尼苏卡-金廷（Anthony Sinisuka Ginting），在伯明翰首次夺得全英羽毛球公开赛男子单打冠军。
item.description:
Indonesia's Jonatan Christie beat compatriot Anthony Sinisuka Ginting 21-15, 21-14 to win his first All England Open men's singles badminton title in Birmingham.https://t.co/GyJFxa6NwN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 17, 2024

item.title: 阿马德-迪亚洛（Amad Diallo）在加时赛后以 4-3 的比分险胜利物浦，曼联终结了利物浦在克洛普的最后一个赛季中对四冠王奖杯的追求。#AFPSports
item.description:
Manchester United ended Liverpool's quest for a quadruple of trophies in Jurgen Klopp's final season after Amad Diallo's winner edged a thrilling FA Cup quarter-final 4-3 after extra-time. #AFPSportshttps://t.co/LhPvd78LN5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 17, 2024

item.title: 弗洛里安-维尔茨（Florian Wirtz）在 84 秒后进球，拜耳勒沃库森队在周日的比赛中以 3-2 的比分战胜弗赖堡队，在各项赛事中保持 38 场不败。#AFPSports
item.description:
Florian Wirtz scored after 84 seconds as Bayer Leverkusen made it 38 games unbeaten in all competitions with a 3-2 victory in Freiburg on Sunday. #AFPSportshttps://t.co/q3zdEr6P0C pic.twitter.com/MNdcofhALZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 17, 2024

item.title: 出口民调显示，弗拉基米尔-普京成功连任俄罗斯总统六年，为这位强硬派前间谍成为 200 多年来任期最长的俄罗斯领导人铺平了道路。
item.description:
Vladimir Putin has secured another six-year term as Russian president, exit polls showed, paving the way for the hardline former spy to become the longest-serving Russian leader in more than 200 years.https://t.co/ZFR7XhMMN7 pic.twitter.com/hh466vcfcP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 17, 2024

item.title: 在尤文图斯被热那亚逼平之后，AC 米兰以 3-1 击败维罗纳，巩固了意甲第二的位置，而佛罗伦萨对亚特兰大的比赛则因俱乐部总经理朱塞佩-"乔"-巴罗内生病而推迟。
item.description:
AC Milan consolidated second place in Serie A by beating Verona 3-1 after Juventus were held by Genoa, while Fiorentina's match at Atalanta was postponed after the club's general manager Giuseppe "Joe" Barone was taken ill.https://t.co/eeLM1kjC9A pic.twitter.com/iejK2tRJ64

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 17, 2024

item.title: #世界排名第一的斯维特克横扫萨卡里，第二次夺得印第安维尔斯 WTA 冠军 #AFPSports

#BREAKING World No. 1 Swiatek sweeps past Sakkari for second Indian Wells WTA title #AFPSports

item.title: 功夫熊猫 4》连续第二个周末蝉联北美票房冠军，以微弱优势超过《沙丘》：第二部》。
item.description:
For a second weekend running "Kung Fu Panda 4" battled its way to the top of the North American box office, narrowly edging out "Dune: Part Two," according to industry watcher Exhibitor Relations.https://t.co/1wd8OdYFHl

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 17, 2024

item.title: 美国总统乔-拜登在一年一度的媒体晚宴上拿唐纳德-特朗普和他自己的年龄开玩笑--然后对他在11月大选中的对手提出了致命的严肃批评。
item.description:
US President Joe Biden joked about Donald Trump and his own age at an annual media dinner -- before unloading deadly serious criticisms of his rival in November's election.https://t.co/bB90vbzy8j pic.twitter.com/jOWSCZ1wQz

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 17, 2024
